# substituteFont(for:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a screen font suitable for use in place of the specified original font,.

## Declaration

```swift
func substituteFont(for originalFont: NSFont) -> NSFont
```

## Discussion

A screen font can be substituted if the receiver is set to use screen fonts and if no [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextView] associated with the receiver is scaled or rotated. If a suitable screen font isn’t available or usable, this method returns the original font.
